name: Product Release Video - AI Assistant Launch
description: Storyboard for launching our new AI assistant feature

requirements.audience: Small business owners and entrepreneurs who struggle with content creation
requirements.cta: Sign up for our free trial and create your first AI-powered video today
requirements.main_problem: Small business owners spend too much time creating marketing content instead of focusing on their core business

type1_requirements.key_features: AI-powered video creation, automated script generation, professional templates, brand-consistent styling
type1_requirements.typical_use_cases: Product announcements, social media content, customer onboarding, team training videos
type1_requirements.core_interaction_steps: 1. Upload brand assets 2. Describe your video goals 3. AI generates script and storyboard 4. Customize and refine 5. Export professional video
